mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.write_date, b.comment_count, b.refer, b.depth, b.step, b.no, b.id, u.NICKNAME from board_list b inner join `user` u on b.id = u.id where no=#{no}

select b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.write_date, b.comment_count, b.no, b.id, a.name, u.nickname from board_list b inner join `user` u on b.id = u.id inner join all_board_list a on b.no = a.no where board_no=#{boardNo}
